title: The Switch Crushes Wii U in Japan - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.08.18
description:
Go to http://www.rover.com/kindafunny for $25 off!

In just 10 months, the Switch has sold more units than the Wii U has in five years. Tim and Greg discuss.

Thanks to Leesa for sponsoring this episode. Go to https://Leesa.com/KindaFunny use promo code: KINDAFUNNY

00:02:40 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:03:31 - Xbox One PUBG Gets Patch #4
00:08:51 - IGF Award Nominees Announced
00:16:30 - Switch has crushed Wii U’s Numbers in Japan, via IGN
00:19:26 - PSVR Game Numbers to Go Nuts, via siliconera
00:24:40 - The official list of upcoming games
 Reader mail   -
00:29:30 - Is there a specific reason that you guys tend to ignore and or dismiss the Monster Hunter games - Dadpool
00:32:07 - Will we ever get a remastered Mass Effect Trilogy - Matthew Clem
00:34:25 - What game would you love to see a speed run of? - LordofPwn
00:36:55 - When will Sony announce God of War  - Eric K
00:43:30 - Your experiences in general with the PS4 Pro - Nick Currier
00:46:43 - Hyped for Sea of Thieves - Antony (from the UK)
00:48:24 - Do you think they could potentially do something like Driveclub, and release a "Dreams PS+ Edition", which incl. the campaign and perhaps access to the Weekly Top 10 levels, but if you want access to the tools and other levels, you'd have to buy the Complete Edition for something like $39.99? - Charles Jakobsen
00:49:30 - Squad Up - Adam @ Switch Indie Fix(Discord): The server name is Switch Indie Fix. The invite link is https://discord.gg/GwzyjN4
@switchindiefix on twitter
00:50:45 - PSVR Shoutout - Its That Dave
00:52:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Andrea

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
